mean_cn: n. （婚礼、狂欢节中抛撒的）五彩纸屑
mean_en: small pieces of brightly colored paper that people often throw at celebrations (such as weddings and parties)
short_phrase: lots of paper confetti in the air
sentence: We threw confetti over the couple to celebrate their marriage.
sentence_trans: 我们向这对新人抛洒五彩纸屑来庆祝他们结婚。
